description: This file provides mapping helper functions for converting Confluence API data structures into unified internal models. It includes functions to map spaces, pages, and comments, extracting relevant fields and organizing them into simplified dicts.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] map_space_to_container(space: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Converts a Confluence space dictionary into a unified model container dict, extracting id, label, type, and meta information.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] map_page_to_item(page: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Transforms a Confluence page dictionary into a unified item dict, including containerId and version info.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] map_comment_to_unified(comment: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Maps a Confluence comment dictionary into a unified comment dict, capturing author, text, creation, and update timestamps.
